text: Thoros III or Toros III (Armenian: Թորոս Երրորդ, same as Theodore; c. 1271 – 23 July 1298) was king of the Armenian Kingdom of Cilicia, ruling from 1293 to 1298. He was the son of Leo III of Armenia and Keran, and the brother and successor of Hethum II. Category:Monarchs of Armenia Category:13th-century Armenian people
title: Thoros III of Armenia
